text: Hansford Tillman Johnson (born January 3, 1936)Who's Who in America - 2008, 62nd Edition (pub. 2007) is a retired four-star general in the U.S. Air Force. He served as the Acting United States Secretary of the Navy in the administration of U.S. President George W. Bush. He is the only retired Air Force officer to ever hold that position. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official United States Navy bio Category:Living people Category:1936 births Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy Category:Military people from South Carolina
title: Hansford T. Johnson
